query:
SELECT 
  'projects' as tabela, COUNT(*) as total FROM projects
UNION ALL
SELECT 'clientes', COUNT(*) FROM clientes
UNION ALL
SELECT 'concorrentes', COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes
UNION ALL
SELECT 'leads', COUNT(*) FROM leads
UNION ALL
SELECT 'mercados', COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos
